get.summary: Converts the HTML document (located on storage) to the specified image format and returns resulting file in response content.

parameters.name: outFormat
parameters.description: Resulting image format. Supported values are: jpeg, bmp, png, gif, tiff

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Resulting image width in points (1/96 inch).

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Resulting image height in points (1/96 inch).

parameters.name: leftMargin
parameters.description: Left resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch).

parameters.name: rightMargin
parameters.description: Right resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch).

parameters.name: topMargin
parameters.description: Top resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch).

parameters.name: bottomMargin
parameters.description: Bottom resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch).

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Resolution of resulting image. Default is 96 dpi.

200.description: Returns the result. Content is an image file - check the HTTP response Content-Type header value.

parameters.name: bottomMargin
parameters.description: Bottom resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch).

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Resolution of resulting image. Default is 96 dpi.

200.description: Returns the result. Content is an image file - check the HTTP response Content-Type header value.

get.summary: Populate HTML document template with data located as a file in the storage.

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: Template document name. Template document is HTML or zipped HTML.

parameters.name: dataPath
parameters.description: Data source file path in the storage. Supported data formats: XML, JSON. File name extension must match the format.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Template merge options: JSON list of name-value pairs

200.description: Returns the result. Content is an image file - check the HTTP response Content-Type header value.

post.summary: Populate HTML document template with data from the request body. Result document will be saved to storage.

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: Template document name. Template document is HTML or zipped HTML.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Template merge options: JSON list of name-value pairs

200.description: Returns the result. Content is an image file - check the HTTP response Content-Type header value.
